00040 // Note: this was renamed from struct Resource in the book.
00041 class Resource
00042 {
00043 public:
00044         std::string m_name;
00045         unsigned int m_size;
00046 
00047         Resource(std::string name) { m_name=name; m_size=0; }
00048 };
00049 
00050 class CZipFile;
00051 
00052 class ResourceZipFile : public IResourceFile
00053 {
00054         CZipFile *m_pZipFile;
00055         std::wstring m_resFileName;
00056 
00057 public:
00058         ResourceZipFile(const _TCHAR *resFileName) { m_pZipFile = NULL; m_resFileName=resFileName; }
00059         virtual ~ResourceZipFile();
00060 
00061         virtual bool VOpen();
00062         virtual int VGetResourceSize(const Resource &r);
00063         virtual int VGetResource(const Resource &r, char *buffer);
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 class ResHandle
00068 {
00069         friend class ResCache;
00070 
00071 protected:
00072         Resource m_resource;
00073         const char *m_buffer;                                           
00074 
00075 public:
00076         ResHandle(const Resource & resource, const char *buffer);
00077         virtual ~ResHandle();
00078 };
00079 
00080 
00081 typedef std::list<ResHandle *> ResHandleList;                   // lru list
00082 typedef std::map<std::string, ResHandle *> ResHandleMap;                // maps indentifiers to resource data
00083 
00084 class ResCache
00085 {
00086         ResHandleList m_lru;                                                            // lru list
00087         ResHandleMap m_resources;
00088         IResourceFile *m_file;
00089 
00090         unsigned int                    m_cacheSize;                    // total memory size
00091         unsigned int                    m_allocated;                    // total memory allocated
00092 
00093 protected:
00094 
00095         bool MakeRoom(unsigned int size);
00096         char *Allocate(unsigned int size);
00097         void Free(ResHandle *gonner);
00098 
00099         const void *Load(const Resource & r);
00100         ResHandle *Find(const Resource & r);
00101         const void *Update(ResHandle *handle);
00102 
00103         void FreeOneResource();
00104 
00105 public:
00106         ResCache(const unsigned int sizeInMb, IResourceFile *file);
00107         virtual ~ResCache();
00108 
00109         bool Init() { return m_file->VOpen(); }
00110         bool Create(Resource & r);
00111         const void *Get(const Resource & r);
00112 
00113         void Flush(void);
00114 
00115 };
